title: MWAN Multi-App Booth Application

content.value: The *MWAN Multi-App Booth* is a unified interactive experience designed for large touchscreens, serving as the digital centerpiece for the *National Center for Waste Management's* exhibitions.

It seamlessly integrates three distinct applications: an *informational hub* for public awareness, a *simulation platform* for the E-Manifest system, and an *interactive investment map* for stakeholders.

content.caption: Interactive 3D Map Visualization
content.text: The *3D Interactive Map* allows users to explore investment opportunities across Saudi Arabia, visualizing data in an engaging and informative way.

content.caption: Interactive Analysis & Simulation
content.text: The *simulation platform* guides users through the complete E-Manifest workflow, demonstrating how waste management tracking works from generation to final disposal

content.value: Built with performance and accessibility in mind, the application features full *RTL support*, smooth animations, and a high-fidelity *interactive map of Saudi Arabia*.

shortDescription: Interactive touch-screen kiosk application for MWAN featuring 3 sub-apps for data visualization and user journeys.
metaDescription: Explore the MWAN interactive booth application, featuring React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS for a seamless touch-screen experience at the National Center for Waste Management event.
objectives: Visualize investment opportunities on a 3D map

functionality.description: A high-fidelity interactive map of Saudi Arabia visualizing investment opportunities and waste management data.
An interactive walkthrough of the E-Manifest system, guiding users through the waste tracking process.
Integrated viewer for displaying official documents and regulations directly within the kiosk interface.
Full Right-to-Left support ensuring correct text rendering and layout for Arabic content.

notes: Designed for large touchscreens with RTL support.
